collections.tree.adt

Interface BinarySearchTreeADT<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic type for tree node elements
    All Superinterfaces:
    BinaryTreeADT<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayBinarySearchTree, LinkedBinarySearchTree, OrderedBinaryTreeAVL

    public interface BinarySearchTreeADT<T>
extends BinaryTreeADT<T>
    BinarySearchTreeADT defines the interface to a binary search tree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addElement(T element)
      Adds the specified element to the proper location in this tree.
      T findMax()
      Returns a reference to the largest element in this tree.
      T findMin()
      Returns a reference to the smallest element in this tree.
      void removeAllOccurrences(T targetElement)
      Removes all occurences of the specified element from this tree.
      T removeElement(T targetElement)
      Removes and returns the specified element from this tree.
      T removeMax()
      Removes and returns the largest element from this tree.
      T removeMin()
      Removes and returns the smallest element from this tree.
